title: Greek children
brief_description: Daily activities of a boy and girl in Galaxidi, a fishing village in southern Greece; chores of the girl and other womenfolk, the boy’s friendship with the village Shepard who teaches him to play the flute; the boy and his father travel to Athens in an old fishing boat; views of the Acropolis.
